alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lucas; Marion; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 1:18PM CDT until March 31 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lucas County in south central Iowa... Southwestern Marion County in south central Iowa... Eastern Clarke County in south central Iowa... Eastern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 118 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weldon, or 5 miles southeast of Osceola, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woodburn around 125 PM CDT. Lucas around 130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Otter Creek County Park, Milo, Lacona, Melcher-Dallas and Sandyville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 26 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Iowa.
